commit.message:
c4x.c (c4x_function_arg): Check for void_type_node before checking MUST_PASS_IN_STACK.

	* config/c4x/c4x.c (c4x_function_arg): Check for void_type_node
 	before checking MUST_PASS_IN_STACK.

From-SVN: r32865
